en-US.name: nightlife Pack
en-US.summary: The nightlife pack is a great addition because you will hear places about nightlife.
en-US.description: The nightlife pack expands the set of places shared with you to include places about nightlife.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The nightlife pack adds over 10 nightlife places into the set of places randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the nightlife pack.  You now have access to nightlife places!

testingInstructions: Built Using Sample Fact In Skill Purchases
